concept.title: List of Sections Affected

entry.p: Amend section 2.101, in paragraph (b), in the definition “ Ineligible” by removing from paragraph (4) “$15,000” and adding “$10,000” in its place.
Amend section 9.109-4 by—
a. Removing from the last sentence in paragraph (a)(1)(i) “via the internet at” and adding “at” in its place; and
b. Revising paragraph (d).
Amend section 9.400 by removing from paragraph (b) “(9.405(b))” and adding “(9.405)” in its place.
Amend section 9.405 by—
a. Removing the last sentence from paragraph (b);
b. Redesignating paragraphs (c) and (d) as paragraphs (d) and (e); and
c. Adding a new paragraph (c)
Amend section 9.405-2 by removing from paragraph (a) “9.405(b)” and adding “9.405” in its place.
Amend section 9.406-2 by adding paragraph (b)(1)(vii).
Amend section 9.406-4 by revising paragraph (a)(1)(iii).
Amend section 9.407-2 by—
a. Redesignating paragraph (a)(9) as (a)(10); and
b. Adding a new paragraph (a)(9).
Revise section 12.203 by redesignating the text as paragraph (a) and adding paragraph (b).
Amend section 13.106-1 by adding paragraphs (a)(2)(v) and (a)(2)(vi).
Amend section 13.106-3 by—
b. In paragraph (b)(3)(i), removing “; or” and adding “;” in its place;
d. Adding paragraph (b)(3)(iii).
Amend section 15.101-2 by adding paragraphs (c) and (d).
Amend section 15.209 by adding paragraph (e)
Amend section 16.505 by—
a. Removing from the end of paragraph (b)(1)(ii) “must—” adding “shall—” in its place;
b. Removing from paragraph (b)(1)(ii)(D) “contract; and” and adding “contract;” in its place;
c. Removing from paragraph (b)(1)(ii)(E) “decision.” and adding “decision;” in its place;
d. Adding paragraphs (b)(1)(ii)(F) and (b)(1)(ii)(G); and
e. Adding paragraph (b)(7)(iii).
Amend section 17.502-1 by—
a. Removing from the sixth sentence of paragraph (a)(1)(i) “Policy” and “__acq/iac__” adding “Policy (OFPP)” and “_acq/iac_” in their place; respectively; and
b. Removing from paragraph (b) introductory text “Office of Federal Procurement Policy (OFPP)” and adding “OFPP” in its place.
Amend section 19.602-1 by removing from paragraph (a) “and 28.203(c))” and adding “and 28.203-1(e))” in its place.
Amend section 28.102-2 by removing from paragraph (e) “of 28.203-5(c)” and adding “of 28.203-3(c)” in its place.
Amend section 28.106-1 by removing paragraph (o); redesignating paragraph (p) as paragraph (o); and revising the new redesignated paragraph (o).
Amend section 28.202 by—
a. Revising paragraph (a)(1);
b. Revising the first sentence of paragraph (a)(2);
d. Removing from paragraph (a)(4) “Standard Form 273”, “Standard Form 274” and “Standard Form 275” and adding “Standard Form (SF) 273”, “SF 274”, and “SF 275” in their places, respectively;
e. Revising the first sentence of paragraph (c); and
f. Revising paragraph (d).
Revise section 28.203.
Amend section 28.204-1 by removing from the first sentence of the text “dated July 1, 1978”.
Amend section 32.202-4 by removing from paragraph (c) “28.203-2, 28.203-3, and” and adding “28.203 and” in its place.
Amend section 37.102 by adding paragraph (j).
Amend section 37.103 in paragraph (d) by removing “42 U.S.C. 13041, as amended,” and adding “34 U.S.C. 20351” in its place.
Amend section 52.209-13 by—
a. Revising the date of the provision;
b. Removing from paragraph (a) “acquisitions below” and adding “acquisitions at or below” in its place;
c. Removing from paragraph (b)(1)(i) “available via the internet at” and adding “available at” in its place; and
d. Removing from paragraph (b)(1)(ii) “available via the internet at” and adding “available at” in its place.
Amend section 52.212-3 by—
a. Revising the date of the provision; and
b. Revising paragraph (f)(2);
c. Revising the table in paragraph (g)(1)(ii), and the undesignated tables in (g)(1)(iii), (g)(2), and (g)(3);
d. Revising the tables in (g)(4) and (g)(5)(ii); and
e. Revising the paragraph (i)(1).
Amend section 52.212-5 in Alternate II by—
a. Revising the date of the Alternate; and
b. Revising paragraphs (e)(1)(ii)(R)(1) and (2)
Amend section 52.213-4 by—
a. Revising the date of the clause; and
b. Adding paragraph (a)(2)(ix).
Amend section 52.222-18 by revising the date of the provision and the undesignated table in paragraph (b)
Amend section 52.223-3 by revising the date of the clause and the undesignated table in paragraph (b).
Amend section 52.225-2 by revising the date of the provision and paragraph (b).
Amend section 52.225-4 by—
a. Revising the section heading and the date of the provision;
b. Revising the table in paragraphs (b) and (c);
c. Revising the date of Alternate II and the undesignated table in paragraph (b) of Alternate II; and
d. Revising the date of Alternate III and the table in paragraph (b) of Alternate III.
Amend section 52.225-6 by revising the date of the provision and the undesignated table in paragraph (b).
Amend section 52.225-9 by revising the date of the clause and paragraph (b)(2).
Amend section 52.225-13 by—
a. Revising the date of clause; and

b. Removing from paragraph (b) “ http://www.treas.gov/offices/enforcement/ofac/sdn and “http://www.treas.gov/offices/enforcement/ofac and adding “https://home.treasury.gov/policy-issues/financial-sanctions/specially-designated-nationals-and-blocked-persons-list-sdn-human-readable-lists and “https://home.treasury.gov/policy-issues/office-of-foreign-assets-control-sanctions-programs-and-information in their places, respectively.
Revise section 52.228-11.
Add section 52.228-17.
Amend section 52.229-12 by—
a. Revising the date of clause; and
b. Removing from paragraph (d) “3ontractor must identify” and adding “the Contractor must identify” in its place.
Amend section 53.228 by—
b. Removing paragraph (o);
c. Redesignating paragraph (p) as paragraph (o); and
d. Removing from the newly redesignated paragraph (o) “(See 28.106-1(p) and 28.203-5(a).)” and adding “(See 28.106-1(o) and 28.203-3(a).)” in its place.
Amend section 53.300 by removing from the table 53-1 in paragraph (a) “OF 90 Release of Lien on Real Property.”
